tests.name: Style
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install -q setuptools; sudo -H pip3 install -qr requirements.txt
tests.run: flake8 --ignore "N801, E203, E266, E501, W503, F812, E741, N803, N802, N806" minitorch/ tests/ project/
